original_text: As a bird that wandereth from her nest, so is a man that wandereth from his place.
korean_text: 고향을 떠나 유리하는 사람은 보금자리를 떠나 떠도는 새와 같으니라

sentences.original_text: As a bird that wandereth from her nest
so is a man that wandereth from his place
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇게 자기 곳을 떠나 헤매는 사람도 그러하니라
